channel.title: Auxiliary on SoftLayer API
channel.description: Recent content in Auxiliary on SoftLayer API

item.title: SoftLayer_Auxiliary_Marketing_Event
item.description: SoftLayer_Auxiliary_Marketing_Event Service Datatype Description Methods getMarketingEvents This method retrieves marketing events. getObject Retrieve a SoftLayer_Auxiliary_Marketing_Event record.

item.title: SoftLayer_Auxiliary_Network_Status
item.description: SoftLayer_Auxiliary_Network_Status Service Datatype Description This service provides a way for a SoftLayer customer to obtain current latency information from around the world to our datacenters, and segments of our network both public and private. There are a few valid targets. Currently the valid targets are as follows: * ALL * NETWORK_DALLAS * NETWORK_HOUSTON * NETWORK_SANJOSE * NETWORK_SEATTLE * NETWORK_WDC * NETWORK_PUBLIC * NETWORK_PUBLIC_DALLAS * NETWORK_PUBLIC_HOUSTON * NETWORK_PUBLIC_SANJOSE * NETWORK_PUBLIC_SEATTLE * NETWORK_PUBLIC_WDC * NETWORK_PRIVATE * NETWORK_PRIVATE_DALLAS * NETWORK_PRIVATE_HOUSTON * NETWORK_PRIVATE_SANJOSE * NETWORK_PRIVATE_SEATTLE * NETWORK_PRIVATE_WDC Information

item.title: SoftLayer_Auxiliary_Notification_Emergency
item.description: SoftLayer_Auxiliary_Notification_Emergency Service Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Auxiliary_Notification_Emergency service is associated with all actions pertaining to the notification system. It can be used to check for current network or service interruptions that effect SoftLayer services. Methods getAllObjects Retrieve all notification events. getCurrentNotifications Retrieve current notification events. getObject Retrieve a SoftLayer_Auxiliary_Notification_Emergency record. getSignature Retrieve the signature of the SoftLayer employee department associated with this notification.

item.title: SoftLayer_Auxiliary_Press_Release
item.description: SoftLayer_Auxiliary_Press_Release Service Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Auxiliary_Press_Release service is associated with all actions pertaining to the press release management tool. It can be used to obtain a single press release, all press releases, press releases for a given year and highlighted press releases. Methods getAbout getAllObjects Retrieve all press releases. getContacts getMediaPartners getObject Retrieve a SoftLayer_Auxiliary_Press_Release record.

item.title: SoftLayer_Auxiliary_Press_Release_About
item.description: SoftLayer_Auxiliary_Press_Release_About Service Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Auxiliary_Press_Release_About service provides all the about paragraphs associated to a press release. Methods getObject Retrieve a SoftLayer_Auxiliary_Press_Release_About record.

item.title: SoftLayer_Auxiliary_Press_Release_About_Press_Release
item.description: SoftLayer_Auxiliary_Press_Release_About_Press_Release Service Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Auxiliary_Press_Release_About_Press_Release service associates a press release to one or more about paragraphs. Methods getAboutParagraphs getObject Retrieve a SoftLayer_Auxiliary_Press_Release_About_Press_Release record. getPressReleases

item.title: SoftLayer_Auxiliary_Press_Release_Contact
item.description: SoftLayer_Auxiliary_Press_Release_Contact Service Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Auxiliary_Press_Release_Contact service provides all contacts associated to a press release. Methods getObject Retrieve a SoftLayer_Auxiliary_Press_Release_Contact record.

item.title: SoftLayer_Auxiliary_Press_Release_Contact_Press_Release
item.description: SoftLayer_Auxiliary_Press_Release_Contact_Press_Release Service Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Auxiliary_Press_Release_Contact_Press_Release service associates a press release to one or more contacts. Methods getContacts getObject Retrieve a SoftLayer_Auxiliary_Press_Release_Contact_Press_Release record. getPressReleases

item.title: SoftLayer_Auxiliary_Press_Release_Content
item.description: SoftLayer_Auxiliary_Press_Release_Content Service Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Auxiliary_Press_Release_Content service is associated with all actions pertaining to the press release management tool. It can be used to obtain a the press release content for a given press release. Methods getObject Retrieve a SoftLayer_Auxiliary_Press_Release_Content record.

item.title: SoftLayer_Auxiliary_Press_Release_Media_Partner
item.description: SoftLayer_Auxiliary_Press_Release_Media_Partner Service Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Auxiliary_Press_Release_Media_Partner service provides all media partners associated to a press release. Methods getObject Retrieve a SoftLayer_Auxiliary_Press_Release_Media_Partner record.

item.title: SoftLayer_Auxiliary_Press_Release_Media_Partner_Press_Release
item.description: SoftLayer_Auxiliary_Press_Release_Media_Partner_Press_Release Service Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Auxiliary_Press_Release_Media_Partner_Press_Release service associates a press release to one or more media partners. Methods getMediaPartners getObject Retrieve a SoftLayer_Auxiliary_Press_Release_Media_Partner_Press_Release record. getPressReleases

item.title: SoftLayer_Auxiliary_Shipping_Courier_Type
item.description: SoftLayer_Auxiliary_Shipping_Courier_Type Service Datatype Description Methods getCourier getObject Retrieve a SoftLayer_Auxiliary_Shipping_Courier_Type record. getTypeByKeyName

item.title: SoftLayer_Auxiliary_Marketing_Event
item.description: SoftLayer_Auxiliary_Marketing_Event Datatype Description Local createDate Type: dateTime enabledFlag Type: integer endDate Type: dateTime location Type: string modifyDate Type: dateTime startDate Type: dateTime title Type: string url Type: string

item.title: SoftLayer_Auxiliary_Marketing_Event
item.description: SoftLayer_Auxiliary_Marketing_Event Service Datatype Description Local createDate Type: dateTime enabledFlag Type: integer endDate Type: dateTime location Type: string modifyDate Type: dateTime startDate Type: dateTime title Type: string url Type: string

item.title: SoftLayer_Auxiliary_Notification_Emergency
item.description: SoftLayer_Auxiliary_Notification_Emergency Datatype Description A SoftLayer_Auxiliary_Notification_Emergency data object represents a notification event being broadcast to the SoftLayer customer base. It is used to provide information regarding outages or current known issues. associatedMethods SoftLayer_Auxiliary_Notification_Emergency::getObject seeAlso SoftLayer_Auxiliary_Notification_Emergency_Status SoftLayer_Auxiliary_Notification_Emergency_Signature Local createDate The date this event was created. Type: dateTime device The device (if any) effected by this event. Type: string

item.title: SoftLayer_Auxiliary_Notification_Emergency
item.description: SoftLayer_Auxiliary_Notification_Emergency Service Datatype Description A SoftLayer_Auxiliary_Notification_Emergency data object represents a notification event being broadcast to the SoftLayer customer base. It is used to provide information regarding outages or current known issues. Local createDate The date this event was created. Type: dateTime device The device (if any) effected by this event. Type: string duration The duration of this event. Type: string

item.title: SoftLayer_Auxiliary_Notification_Emergency_Signature
item.description: SoftLayer_Auxiliary_Notification_Emergency_Signature Datatype Description Every SoftLayer_Auxiliary_Notification_Emergency has a signatureId that references a SoftLayer_Auxiliary_Notification_Emergency_Signature data type. The signature is the user or group responsible for the current event. seeAlso SoftLayer_Auxiliary_Notification_Emergency Local name The name or signature for the current Emergency Notification. Type: string

item.title: SoftLayer_Auxiliary_Notification_Emergency_Signature
item.description: SoftLayer_Auxiliary_Notification_Emergency_Signature Datatype Description Every SoftLayer_Auxiliary_Notification_Emergency has a signatureId that references a SoftLayer_Auxiliary_Notification_Emergency_Signature data type. The signature is the user or group responsible for the current event. Local name The name or signature for the current Emergency Notification. Type: string

item.title: SoftLayer_Auxiliary_Notification_Emergency_Status
item.description: SoftLayer_Auxiliary_Notification_Emergency_Status Datatype Description Every SoftLayer_Auxiliary_Notification_Emergency has a statusId that references a SoftLayer_Auxiliary_Notification_Emergency_Status data type. The status is used to determine the current state of the event. seeAlso SoftLayer_Auxiliary_Notification_Emergency Local name A name describing the status of the current Emergency Notification. Type: string

item.title: SoftLayer_Auxiliary_Notification_Emergency_Status
item.description: SoftLayer_Auxiliary_Notification_Emergency_Status Datatype Description Every SoftLayer_Auxiliary_Notification_Emergency has a statusId that references a SoftLayer_Auxiliary_Notification_Emergency_Status data type. The status is used to determine the current state of the event. Local name A name describing the status of the current Emergency Notification. Type: string

item.title: SoftLayer_Auxiliary_Press_Release
item.description: SoftLayer_Auxiliary_Press_Release Datatype Description associatedMethods SoftLayer_Auxiliary_Press_Prelease::getObject seeAlso SoftLayer_Auxiliary_Press_Release_Content SoftLayer_Auxiliary_Press_Release_About_Press_Release SoftLayer_Auxiliary_Press_Release_Contact_Press_Release SoftLayer_Auxiliary_Press_Release_Media_Partner_Press_Release Local id A press release's internal identifier. Type: integer publishDate The data a press release was published. Type: dateTime releaseLocation A press release's location. Type: string subTitle A press release's sub-title. Type: string title A press release's title.

item.title: SoftLayer_Auxiliary_Press_Release
item.description: SoftLayer_Auxiliary_Press_Release Service Datatype Description Local id A press release's internal identifier. Type: integer publishDate The data a press release was published. Type: dateTime releaseLocation A press release's location. Type: string subTitle A press release's sub-title. Type: string title A press release's title. Type: string websiteHighlightFlag Whether or not a press release is highlighted on the SoftLayer Website.

item.title: SoftLayer_Auxiliary_Shipping_Courier
item.description: SoftLayer_Auxiliary_Shipping_Courier Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Auxiliary_Shipping_Courier data type contains general information relating the different (major) couriers that SoftLayer may use for shipping. Local id The unique id of the shipping courier. Type: integer keyName The unique keyname of the shipping courier. Type: string name The name of the shipping courier. Type: string url The url to shipping courier's website.

Local id The unique id of the shipping courier. Type: integer keyName The unique keyname of the shipping courier. Type: string name The name of the shipping courier. Type: string url The url to shipping courier's website.

item.title: getNetworkStatus
item.description: SoftLayer_Auxiliary_Network_Status::getNetworkStatus Overview Return the current network status of and latency information for a given target from numerous points around the world. Valid Targets: * ALL * NETWORK_DALLAS * NETWORK_SEATTLE * NETWORK_PUBLIC * NETWORK_PUBLIC_DALLAS * NETWORK_PUBLIC_SEATTLE * NETWORK_PUBLIC_WDC * NETWORK_PRIVATE * NETWORK_PRIVATE_DALLAS * NETWORK_PRIVATE_SEATTLE * NETWORK_PRIVATE_WDC Parameters Name Type Description target string ALL NETWORK_DALLAS NETWORK_SEATTLE - NETWORK_PUBLIC NETWORK_PUBLIC_DALLAS NETWORK_PUBLIC_SEATTLE NETWORK_PUBLIC_WDC - NETWORK_PRIVATE NETWORK_PRIVATE_DALLAS NETWORK_PRIVATE_SEATTLE NETWORK_PRIVATE_WDC Required Headers authenticate Optional Headers Return Values SoftLayer_Container_Auxiliary_Network_Status_Reading[]
